Class DecoratedPlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.DecoratedPlayerBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerBoard, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedChangePlayerBoard, DecoratedCostPlayerBoard, DecoratedProductionPlayerBoard, DecoratedWarehousePlayerBoard
public abstract class DecoratedPlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerBoard, java.io.Serializable
